S03n256:1: sati kṣantavye kṣamā syānnāsatītyapakāriṇāmapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante |
S03n256:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasminnaraṇyapradeśe paṅkasaṃparkātparuṣavapurṇīlameghaviccheda iva pādacārī vanamahiṣavṛṣo babhūva |
S03n256:4: sa tasyāṃ durlabhadharmasaṃjñāyāṃ saṃmohabahulāyāmapi tiryaggatau vartamānaḥ paṭuvijñānatvānna dharmacaryānirudyogamatirbabhūva |
S03n256:5: cirānuvṛttyevaḥ nibaddhabhāvā na taṃ kadācitkaruṇā mumoca |
S03n256:6: ko'pi prabhāva sa tu karmaṇo vā tasyaiva vā yatsa tathā babhūva ||1 ||
S03n256:8: kṛpātmakaḥ sannapi yatsa bheje tiryaggatiṃ tatra ca dharmasaṃjñām ||2 ||
S03n256:9: vinā na karmāsti gatiprabandhaḥ śubhaṃ na cāniṣṭavipākamasti |
S03n256:10: sa dharmasaṃjñīpi tu karmaleśāṃstāṃstān samāsādya tathā tathāsīt ||3 ||
S03n256:11: athānyatamo duṣṭavānarastasya kālāntarābhivyaktāṃ prakṛtibhadratāṃ dayānuvṛttyā ca vigatakrodhasaṃrambhatāmavetya nāsmādbhayamastīti taṃ mahāsattvaṃ tena tena vihiṃsākrameṇa bhṛśataramabādhata |
S03n256:13: parāṃ vrajati vikriyāṃ na hi bhayaṃ tataḥ paśyati |
S03n256:16: sa kadācittasya mahāsattvasya visrabdhaprasuptasya nidrāvaśādvā pracalāyataḥ sahasaivopari nipatati sma |
S03n256:20: salilāvagāhanasamutsukasyāpyasya kadācicchiraḥ samabhiruhya pāṇibhyāṃ nayane samāvavre |
S03n256:21: apyenamadhiruhya samudyatadaṇḍaḥ prasahyaiva vāhayan yamasya līlāmanucakāra |
S03n256:22: bodhisattvo'pi mahasattvaḥ sarvaṃ tadasyāvinayaceṣṭitamupakāramiva manyamāno niḥsaṃkṣobhasaṃrambhamanyurmarṣayāmāsa |
S03n256:25: atha kilānyatamo yakṣastamasya paribhavamamṛṣyamāno bhāvaṃ vā jijñāsamānastasya mahāsattvasya tena duṣṭakapinā vāhyamānaṃ taṃ mahiṣavṛṣabhaṃ mārge sthitvedamuvācamā tāvadbhoḥ ! kiṃ parikrīto'syanena duṣṭakapinā ?
S03n256:28: utāho balamātmagataṃ nāveṣi yadevamanena paribhūya vāhyase ? nanu bhoḥ !
S03n256:31: idaṃ ca śailopamasaṃhatasthiraṃ samagraśobhaṃ balasaṃpadā vapuḥ |
S03n256:33: mathāna dhṛtvā tadimaṃ kṣureṇa vā viṣāṇakoṭyā madamasya voddhara |
S03n256:35: asajjanaḥ kutra yathā cikitsyate guṇānuvṛttyā sukhaśīlasaumyayā |
S03n256:36: kaṭuṣṇarūkṣākṣi hi yatra siddhaye kaphātmako roga iva prasarpati ||9 ||
S03n256:38: avaimyenaṃ calaṃ nūnaṃ sadā cāvinaye ratam |
S03n256:39: ata eva mayā tvasya yuktaṃ marṣayituṃ nanu ||10 ||
S03n256:44: asatkriyā hīnabalāścca nāma nirdeśakālaḥ paramo guṇānām |
S03n256:46: nityaṃ kṣamāyāśca nanu kṣamāyāḥ kālaḥ parāyattayā durāpaḥ |
S03n256:47: pareṇa tasminnupapādite ca tatraiva kopapraṇa kopapraṇakramaḥ kaḥ ||14 ||
S03n256:49: na cetkṣamāmapyahamatra kuryāmanya kṛtaghno bata kīdṛśaḥ syāt ||15 ||
S03n256:50: yakṣa uvāca-tena hi na tvamasyāḥ kacācitprabādhanāyā mokṣyase-
S03n256:54: parasya pīḍāpraṇayena yatsukhaṃ nivāraṇaṃ syādasukhodayasya vā |
S03n256:55: sukhārthinastanna niṣevituṃ kṣamaṃ na tadvipāko hi sukhaprasiddhaye ||17 ||
S03n256:58: asatkriyāṃ prāpya ca tadvidhājjanānna mādṛśe'pyevamasau kariṣyati |
S03n256:59: na labdhadoṣo hi punastathācaredataśca muktirmama sā bhaviṣayti ||19 ||
S03n256:60: atha yakṣastaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prasādavismayabahumānāvarjitamatiḥ sādhu sādhviti saśiraḥprakampāṅgalivikṣepamabhisaṃrādhya tattatpriyamuvāca-
S03n256:62: kayāpi buddhyā tvidamāsthito vapustapovane ko'pi bhavāṃstapasyati ||20 ||
S03n256:63: ityenamabhipraśasya taṃ cāsya duṣṭavānaraṃ pṛṣṭhādavadhūya samādiśya cāsya rakṣāvidhānaṃ tatraivāntardadhe |
S03n256:64: tadevaṃ sati kṣantavye kṣamā syānnāsatītyapakāriṇamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante iti kṣāntikathāyāṃ vācyam |
S03n256:66: ko nāma manuṣyabhūtaḥ pravrajitapratijño vā tadvikalaḥ śobheta ?
